ing: 1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle cranberry juice, chilled
des: "This easy, fresh and fruity drink carries the Thanksgiving theme of cranberries throughout the entire meal. we don't eat the fresh cranberries, but they look pretty floating on top. Tastes as good as it looks!"
ins: In a punch bowl, combine cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Stir in pineapple tidbits and cranberries. Serve with ice.
